typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	modifiedAfter as timestamp,
	modifiedBefore as timestamp
}
source(output(
		SalesOrderLine as string,
		SalesOrder as string,
		SalesOrderLineKey as integer,
		Channel as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworks',
	tableName: 'SalesOrder',
	manifestType: 'manifest') ~> SalesOrderDeltaSource
source(output(
		SalesAmount as decimal(18,2),
		TotalProductCost as decimal(18,2),
		ProductStandardCost as decimal(18,2),
		UnitPriceDiscountPct as decimal(18,2),
		ExtendedAmount as decimal(18,2),
		UnitPrice as decimal(18,2),
		OrderQuantity as integer,
		SalesTerritoryKey as integer,
		ShipDateKey as integer,
		DueDateKey as integer,
		OrderDateKey as integer,
		ProductKey as integer,
		CustomerKey as integer,
		ResellerKey as integer,
		SalesOrderLineKey as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworks',
	tableName: 'Sales',
	manifestType: 'manifest') ~> SalesSource
source(output(
		CustomerKey as integer,
		CustomerId as string,
		Customer as string,
		City as string,
		StateProvince as string,
		CountryRegion as string,
		PostalCode as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworks',
	tableName: 'CustomerData',
	manifestType: 'manifest') ~> CustomerDataSource
source(output(
		PostalCode as string,
		CountryRegion as string,
		StateProvince as string,
		City as string,
		Reseller as string,
		BusinessType as string,
		ResellerId as string,
		ResellerKey as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworks',
	tableName: 'Reseller',
	manifestType: 'manifest') ~> ResellerSource
SalesOrderDeltaSource aggregate(groupBy(SalesOrderLineKey),
	SalesOrderLine = last(SalesOrderLine),
		SalesOrder = last(SalesOrder),
		Channel = last(Channel)) ~> Deduplicated1SalesOrderDeltaSource
Deduplicated1SalesOrderDeltaSource select(mapColumn(
		SalesOrderLine,
		SalesOrder,
		SalesOrderLineKey,
		Channel
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SalesOrder
SalesSource aggregate(groupBy(ProductKey,
		CustomerKey,
		ResellerKey,
		SalesOrderLineKey),
	SalesAmount = last(SalesAmount),
		TotalProductCost = last(TotalProductCost),
		ProductStandardCost = last(ProductStandardCost),
		UnitPriceDiscountPct = last(UnitPriceDiscountPct),
		ExtendedAmount = last(ExtendedAmount),
		UnitPrice = last(UnitPrice),
		OrderQuantity = last(OrderQuantity),
		SalesTerritoryKey = last(SalesTerritoryKey),
		ShipDateKey = last(ShipDateKey),
		DueDateKey = last(DueDateKey),
		OrderDateKey = last(OrderDateKey)) ~> Deduplicated1SalesSource
Deduplicated1SalesSource select(mapColumn(
		SalesAmount,
		TotalProductCost,
		ProductStandardCost,
		UnitPriceDiscountPct,
		ExtendedAmount,
		UnitPrice,
		OrderQuantity,
		SalesTerritoryKey,
		ShipDateKey,
		DueDateKey,
		OrderDateKey,
		ProductKey,
		CustomerKey,
		ResellerKey,
		SalesOrderLineKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Sales
SalesOrder, Sales join(SalesOrder@SalesOrderLineKey === Sales@SalesOrderLineKey,
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinSales
CustomerDataSource aggregate(groupBy(CustomerKey),
	PostalCode = last(PostalCode),
		CountryRegion = last(CountryRegion),
		StateProvince = last(StateProvince),
		City = last(City),
		Customer = last(Customer),
		CustomerId = last(CustomerId)) ~> Deduplicated1CustomerDataSource
Deduplicated1CustomerDataSource select(mapColumn(
		PostalCode,
		CountryRegion,
		StateProvince,
		City,
		Customer,
		CustomerId,
		CustomerKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> CustomerData
JoinSales, CustomerData join(Sales@CustomerKey === CustomerData@CustomerKey,
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinCustomerData
ResellerSource aggregate(groupBy(ResellerKey),
	PostalCode = last(PostalCode),
		CountryRegion = last(CountryRegion),
		StateProvince = last(StateProvince),
		City = last(City),
		Reseller = last(Reseller),
		BusinessType = last(BusinessType),
		ResellerId = last(ResellerId)) ~> Deduplicated1ResellerSource
Deduplicated1ResellerSource select(mapColumn(
		PostalCode,
		CountryRegion,
		StateProvince,
		City,
		Reseller,
		BusinessType,
		ResellerId,
		ResellerKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Reseller
JoinCustomerData, Reseller join(Sales@ResellerKey === Reseller@ResellerKey,
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinReseller
JoinReseller select(mapColumn(
		SalesOrder,
		CustomerData_CustomerKey_Generated = CustomerData@CustomerKey,
		Reseller_ResellerKey_Generated = Reseller@ResellerKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectJoinReseller
SelectJoinReseller select(mapColumn(
		TransactionId = SalesOrder,
		CustomerId = CustomerData_CustomerKey_Generated,
		ChannelId = Reseller_ResellerKey_Generated
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Transaction
Transaction sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworkstarget',
	tableName: 'Transaction',
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	manifestType: 'manifest') ~> TransactionSink
